short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pauses and resumes YouTube and Netflix videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You are watching videos on YouTube or Netflix and wanting to automatically pause to the video from time to time to eat some snacks or take a break. Whatever your reasons are, Eat Your Food, Kids! is here to help.
